title: Document Archive: Dashboard sizing + button color consistency + solid Settings dialogs

requirements.summary: Reduce Dashboard “Browse by Category” category card/button visual footprint ~50% while preserving navigation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Dashboard “Browse by Category” section, each category card occupies noticeably less space (approximately half the current visual footprint).
Clicking a category card still navigates to /documents with the correct categoryId search param.
Clicking the “View Documents” button inside a card still works and does not trigger double navigation.

file_operations.description: Update the “Browse by Category” Card/CardContent sizing (reduce padding, icon container size, icon size, and typography) while keeping the same map over categories and existing navigate + stopPropagation behavior. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button via className overrides only; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make Dashboard category action buttons use a light-blue primary accent with readable contrast in light/dark modes.
acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard “View Documents” button in each category card uses a light-blue appearance (not the default ghost style).
Text remains readable with sufficient contrast in both light and dark mode.

file_operations.description: Change the “View Documents” Button styling from ghost to a light-blue accented look using Tailwind className overrides (including hover/focus states) with explicit dark-mode classes to ensure consistent accent and contrast. Use shadcn-ui Button via composition/className (do not edit ui sources); Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Style the Upload page primary submit button to use #0052cc with accessible hover/active/disabled states across themes.
acceptanceCriteria: On UploadDocumentPage, the “Upload Document” submit button background is #0052cc.
Hover/focus states remain visually clear and accessible.

file_operations.description: Override the submit Button (type="submit") styling to use background #0052cc with explicit hover/active/focus-visible and disabled Tailwind classes, ensuring readable text in both light/dark modes. Use shadcn-ui Button via className overrides only; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Improve Settings Add Category button presentation with #0052cc box treatment and ensure Add Category/Add Office dialogs have solid white backgrounds in light mode.
acceptanceCriteria: On SettingsPage, the “Add Category” button is visually presented with a #0052cc box/background treatment (not default styling).
When the Add Category dialog opens, the dialog content has a solid white background in light mode (no transparency).
When the Add Office dialog opens, the dialog content has a solid white background in light mode (no transparency).

file_operations.description: Restyle the “Add Category” trigger to present it in a visually distinct #0052cc box/background treatment using wrapper + Button className overrides. Update the Add Category and Add Office DialogContent className to use solid white background in light mode (e.g., bg-white) while preserving appropriate dark mode styling. Use shadcn-ui Dialog/Button via composition/className (do not edit ui sources); Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
